autoScroll.description: Enables automatic scrolling when the list overflows

bordered.description: Displays borders around the list items

divider.description: Displays a divider between the list items

hover.description: Enables hover animation on list items

onSortEnd.description: Callback triggered after the sorting operation ends

onSortMove.description: Callback triggered when an item is moved in the list

onSortStart.description: Callback triggered at the start of sorting

pressDelay.description: Delay before sorting is triggered after pressing

size.description: Defines the size of the list items

sortable.description: Enables sorting functionality for the list items

transitionDuration.description: Duration (in milliseconds) of the sort animation

collection.description: The collection identifier for the list item

disabled.description: Disables the item, preventing it from being moved

index.description: The unique index of the item within its collection, required for sorting

size.description: Defines the size of the individual list item
